attributes.action: Let the people vote if we should have another general election.
attributes.additional_details:
Labour got into government out of the failures of the conservatives and not from their popularity. People voted for Labour because they beleaved there was nowhere else to turn. But with parties like the lib dems and reform making Gains in the polls I beleave a country wide vote to see if we should have another general election should be held and the people shoul be able to have their say.
Let us the people speak. Let us vote. Let us decide our country's future
attributes.background: I beleave there is a need for another general election due to the failures of the current government. As a democracy we should put it to a vote. Let the people have their say and vote on weather we have another general election or not.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
